page.title: 08The Local Hotel
page.content: The Clyde Valley Hotel is privately owned, and is the only hotel in Kirkfieldbank. It is only a few metres off the main road. It has four bedrooms and eight beds, two beds in each room. It has a ballroom, a small function room, a dining room and a public bar. The ballroom holds up to four hundred people. There are normally two functions on in any week. The busiest time of the year is December. The hotel is normally busiest on Fridays and Saturdays when there are discos, dinner_dances or weddings. It is convenient for visitors to the Clyde Valley Caravan Site (which is only two minutes walk away) to enjoy a meal, a bar_lunch or entertainment.
